bayes.cpd

Class CPDNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayes.cpd.CPDNode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CPDLeaf

    public class CPDNode
extends java.lang.Object
    A single node in a CPD tree. Each node splits the instances in the training set on a certain value of a certain attribute.
    Author:
    Matthew Bernstein - matthewb@cs.wisc.edu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Attribute attribute
      The Attribute that this node tests
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,CPDNode> children
      Each nominal value ID maps to a child node
      protected java.lang.Integer nodeValue
      The values that an instance must meet to make satisfy this node's test
      protected java.lang.Integer numInstances
      The number of instances that have reached this node
      protected CPDNode parent
      This CPDNode's parent

      • getNumOfNominalValue

        public int getNumOfNominalValue(int nominalValueId)
        Get the total number of instances in the data set that "filtered" through to this node AND have the nominal value of the given nominal value ID
        Parameters:
        nominalValueId - the target nominal value ID
        Returns:
        the total number of instances

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:

      • calculateProbability

        public java.lang.Double calculateProbability(CPDQuery query)
        If this node's attribute IS NOT included in the query, we sum the probabilities of this query over all of this node's children. If this node's attribute IS included in the query AND the value of this attribute as specified in the query is equal to this node's value for that attribute, then we sum probabilities of this query over all of this node's children. We return zero, ONLY IF this attribute is specified in this query AND the value of this attribute as specified in the query IS NOT equal to this node's value for that attribute
        Parameters:
        the - BNQuery object specifying the query
        Returns:
        the probability of this query as calculated by the CPD tree rooted at this node

      • setParent

        protected void setParent(CPDNode parent)
        Set the parent node of this node.
        Parameters:
        parent - this node's parent
